text: Stefan Kukoljac (; born 7 April 1996) is a Serbian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Serbian club OFK Beograd. ==Club career== ===Voždovac=== Born in Dortmund, Kukoljac passed youth categories with Čukarički and also played in Germany for some period of his youth career. In summer 2015, Kukoljac signed with Voždovac, but moved on one-year loan to Crvena zvezda Mali Mokri Lug shortly after. Kukoljac made 23 appearances and scored one goal for the team during the 2015–16 Serbian League Belgrade season, and was elected in the team of Belgrade football association ending of 2015. Kukoljac spent the pre-season training with Voždovac in summer 2016, but later moved on new one-year loan to Sinđelić Beograd. ===Later career=== In August 2017, Kukoljac signed a one-year contract with Slovenian club Triglav Kranj. He left Triglav during the winter break in early 2018 and returned to Serbia, playing for lower division sides FK BASK and Crvena Zvezda MML.Stefan Kukoljac at srbijafudbal.com, retrieved 21-10-2019 On 14 July 2019, Kukoljac joined OFK Beograd. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Voždovac |2015–16 |rowspan=2|SuperLiga ||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- |2016–17 ||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- !colspan="2"| Total !0!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!0!!0 |- |Crvena Zvezda MML (loan) |2015–16 |League Belgrade !23!!1!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!23!!1 |- |Sinđelić Beograd (loan) |2016–17 |First League ||11||1||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||11||1 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !34!!2!!0!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!34!!2 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Dortmund Category:Serbian footballers Category:Serbian expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FK Voždovac players Category:FK Sinđelić Beograd players Category:NK Triglav Kranj players Category:FK BASK players Category:OFK Beograd players Category:Serbian First League players Category:Slovenian PrvaLiga players Category:Serbian expatriate sportspeople in Slovenia Category:Expatriate footballers in Slovenia Category:Footballers from North Rhine-Westphalia
